title: PUMA Italy 14/15 Home Soccer Sock
description: Dress up like the players with these Italy 2014/15 Home Replica Football Socks which are designed for comfort and performance. Made from polyester, nylon and spandex, these socks include a wealth of subtle features to help your game. Fitted with side compressed for a better fit on the bottom of the leg, this design also maintains the Achilles heel to give you confidence and also provides a protection of the toes. Its beautiful colour Electric Blue is bordered by a white trim, which is the perfect complement to the rest of the kit Italy.
